message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to make a smart investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $12000 for it. I think this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

I understand you're looking to save money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $16000. This is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.

I understand that you're trying to meet me in the middle, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $13500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

I can see you're still looking to negotiate, but I'm not willing to go as low as $13500. I'm willing to meet you at $17000, which is still a good deal considering the value the product brings. Let's meet in the middle and make a deal!
